cast.overview: Loosely based on the criminal career of Frank Lucas, a gangster from La Grange, North Carolina, who smuggled heroin into the United States on American service planes returning from the Vietnam War, before being detained by a task force led by Newark Detective Richie Roberts.
cast.title: American Gangster

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Monique Gata Dupree (born 10 December 1974) is an American singer and a B-movie horror actress, producer and mother of 10, often referred to as Tha Original Gata or the First Black Scream Queen.  She is best known for her time as a wrestling talent / producer / social media manager for spouse Tommy Dreamer's company, House of Hardcore wrestling as well as appearances on Impact Wrestling. Dreamer on numerous occasions via the House of Hardcore's Twitch stream dubbed Dupree "The Heart and soul of House of Hardcore".

Description above from the Wikipedia article Monique Dupree, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Monique Dupree
